availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Clarinda McKinzie Walsh on September 14, 1859. Father of Gongalpha Walsh, John Walsh, Frank Walsh, Malinda Walsh, Mosolette Walsh, Martha Walsh, Marry Walsh, William Walsh, and Lou Walsh. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, Division 2, p. 97. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, West Liberty, p. 12.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film #000839918, p. 177-78.
Find A Grave, "William A. Walsh (1835-1912)," Memorial #62261397,
https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/62261397/william-a.-walsh# (accessed on August 1, 2018).
